title: Paranoiac

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Deal a Basic Attack to every player except yourself.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You cannot attack two nights in a row.
- You appear suspicious to Sheriff-style investigators.

desc:
Post 1946
*It won't matter if everyone's out to get me or not! I'll just kill them all first! Town wins if the only survivor is a Townie, right?*
